bibl.title: Letter from J.S. Cudlipp to Henry Rose Carter, May 13, 1921

div1.p: Cudlipp provides Carter with Walcott's address in British Guyana.

div1.head: Letter from J.S. Cudlipp to Henry Rose Carter, May 13, 1921
div1.opener:
2. H. B.
Walitt
2M-2-F
N. Y. H.
UNITED FRUIT COMPANY
GENERAL OFFICER, 121 STATE STREET, BOSTON, MASS.
WILLIAM E. DEEKS, M. D.,
GENERAL MANAGER
CABLE ADDRESS
UNIFRUITCO, NEW YORK
MEDICAL DEPARTMENT
17 BATTERY PLACE, NEW YORK
May 13, 1921.
FILE NUMBER....................
Mr. H. R. Carter,
2121 California St., N.W.,
Washington, D. C.
Dear Sir:-
div1.p:
Dr. Deeks is now absent on a trip to the Tropical
Divisions of the United Fruit Company, but in reply to your letter
of May 6th - I wish to advise that the last address we had of
Dr. Allan Walcott was (c/o Demerara Bauxite Company, Limited,
Georgetown, British Guiana, South America). So far as we know
Dr. Walcott is still located there but we have today written to
the Republic Mining & Manufacturing Co, Harrison Building,
Philadelphia, Pa. to ascertain whether he is still in their employ
and upon receipt of their reply, we will again communicate with
you.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, J. S. Cudlipp
Secretary to
General Manager.
